website_summaries.verdict: A great grill-smoker combo if you're looking for something simple to put together and easy to use.
pros: Quickly gets up to temperature, even for grilling
cons: Grill can be difficult to clean in terms of removing the ashes
Some buyers report problems after a few months with the control unit and hopper

customer_reviews.title: Traeger will not stand behind there product
customer_reviews.text: I have had a multitude of issues since purchasing, warranty is great if you want to spend your time working on the grill. They will not replace the grill if you bought through a 3rd party i.e amazon,costco,etc. The last draw for me was when i left some meat to smoke over night and it malfunctioned causing all the meat to burn and dumped a whole hopper of pellets into the bottom of the drum.(potential fire hazard).
customer_reviews.author: Tino

customer_reviews.title: 3RD time not a charm.
customer_reviews.text: The first 2 time we used the Traeger TFB42LZBC smoker it was great. However about 4 hours in the 3RD time using it completely caught fire and destroyed everything we were cooking and almost our gazebo. The hopper was even burning. It was so hot the metal is even destroyed. Looks like I am out $700 because I cannot return it and I will never use it again. I could deal with Traeger support but after what happened I would not feel safe using it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Denni

customer_reviews.title: Love My Grill!
customer_reviews.text: Love my grill! It's a convection oven that blows smoke if anyone doesn't get what this type of grill does. Approximately 430 degrees Fahrenheit is what this will achieve according to it's own thermometer. We use it multiple times per week. Most things you cook in a regular oven will be elevated by throwing on the Traeger.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended. Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after 3 months. I’ve called emailed and Facebook messengered still the problem persists. I’ve had to take apart the hopper 3 times. I guess this is common. Buy a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Keeps on going out, useless
customer_reviews.text: It just does not work. ALWAYS goes out, can not maintain temp at 225. Trying to do a 6 hour rib smoke means you have to watch it closely for the whole time. It will go out. Then the temp crashes, you have to pull everything out, clean all of the un-burned pellets from the fire box, re-start the grill and then put everything back together. All the time your food gets cold and you just added another 45-60 minutes to your cook time. This has happened EVERY time I used the grill. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: There are better, cheaper, options out there.
customer_reviews.text: The grill is well designed, but if you do not have a covered place to grill wood pellets are a terrible option. The pellets constantly get damp and clog the auger. Even in summer when this is not a problem I got better smoke rings using a weber genesis gas grill with wood chips anyway. This grill is expensive to buy, the pellets are expensive, and it is inherently inferior to a true wood smoker or propane conversion.
customer_reviews.author: Blueblur1984

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Smoker
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this smoker for a couple of months. It works well and does an excellent job in smoking meats and chicken. Our first meal was a turkey which was moist and very tasty. We have made corn bread which I believes rivals any store. I did knock one star off. The assembly manual is not user friendly. In fact it is worthless. I assembled the smoker with the help of numerous YouTube videos on assembling and maintaining a Traeger smoker. It was easy to Assemble once I reviewed these videos. I did need help with lifting due to the weight. Overall I feel that this is a great smoker.
customer_reviews.author: rjg

customer_reviews.title: WORTH THE MONEY.
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous. You can control the temperature and walk away. The problem with most bar=b-ques is that you have to stand there constantly and turn and watch. My husband is the " b-b-quer" and he has to leave the party to stand over the grill to make sure the meat isn't burning. With the Traeger, you an put the meat on and leave it for extended periods of time because the heat is controllable. WORTH THE MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene A. Wrighton

customer_reviews.title: Best thing in lieu of real smoker
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this smoker. I can now eat a real brisket. Fill the hopper and you can get 8-10 unattended hours. It maintains its temperature well; it will fluctuate +/- 15 degrees as the unit controls the hopper and feeding the wood pellets. It is very easy to use. It is a very heavy package when it arrives but it is well packed. It arrived in mint condition. I was able to assemble it myself with basic tools. I recommend buying the grill cover to protect your investment. I have been eating / cooking BBQ my entire life. On this grill the brisket has the right amount of charring, good smoke ring, is tender, and has great smoke flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best way for amateurs to succeed in smoke and grill
customer_reviews.text: This grill normalizes the playing field. As an amateur backyard griller, temperature and timing were always an issue. The method of this, the pellets, the hardwoods, and the overall design of it on the interior is amazing. I have already shared with friends and think this is a great way to bring championship smoking and grilling to everyone’s backyard
customer_reviews.author: DogLovers

customer_reviews.title: Have a bottle of ibuprofen before you buy this grill
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product, I took me 2 tries before I got the right Traeger grill sent to me, I've had the little Texas for almost 2 months and my hopper keeps catching fire, popping open, I watched all the videos and bought the traeger brand pellets but it still does not want to keep temp and my hopper keeps smoking, I just recently attempted to smoke Wagu brisket and all was going well, however about an hour after I wrapped it my meat started losing temp so i had to pull it out and finish cooking it in my oven, it really sucks to know that I have a big worthless piece of junk sitting on my property
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed at all.
customer_reviews.text: First arrived dented badly. We had to send it back- was a pain in the @$$. Since then we've had continuous problems with auger backing up/setting fire to pellet box. Shutting off. Been.kind of a really disappearing purchase. We saved up to buy him this ...You'll get same, possibly better, from the Walmart pellet burner for 100's cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Welp.

customer_reviews.title: Fire and forget
customer_reviews.text: Have always used charcoal or propane. Finally decided to go with a Traeger even though I had no experience grilling this way. I love the fire and forget, with no concern with burning. With charcoal and propane you do everything off feel and look, but with a smoker everything is time and temperature. Meat must be completely thawed in order to get the cook time right, where charcoal and propane are much more flexible. Grilling with a Traeger takes a lot less effort, epically on chicken wings. The only gripe is the build sturdiness could be better considering what you are paying.
customer_reviews.author: Scott_123

customer_reviews.title: Unmatched by any other grill!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Traeger! After years of living at a property prohibiting an outdoor grill I have the freedom to grill on my deck. I am taking full advantage of this opportunity by using the best grill I have ever owned. My three brothers and I own Traeger grills and would not have it any other way. I am so impressed with the smart packing and product engineering. Traeger designed an easy and simple assembly process that does not require assistance. Invest 5 minutes to reading the instructions before you begin unpacking the grill. Enjoy your new grill!
customer_reviews.author: CDB

customer_reviews.title: My name is part of theirs
customer_reviews.text: Love this smoker. I was hesitant due to price but I made the decision and have zero regrets. I’ve done many racks of ribs, briskets, chicken, dove poppers, fajitas, and much more. I love the freedom of setting the temp I want and walk away if you want or need. I have not had a single issue in over a year with it but I’ve heard they’re customer service is second to none. When the day comes it it dies and can’t be fixed I will buy another Traeger no doubt. Plus my name is part of theirs
customer_reviews.author: Trae Hutsell

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My dad just about cried when we gave this to him for Fathers Day this past year. He set it up and used it immediately, it was easy to use and clean when we were done. He's managed to keep it in mint condition. The food it makes is delicious as well, with minimum effort. You pretty much just have to throw it in there. Worth the money just to see dad's face, but also a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary H.

customer_reviews.title: It does take a little longer to cook and takes some getting used to as it is not a direct flame heat like a gas grill
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Traeger. If you haven't tried one, you are doing yourself an discredit. Makes the food moist and delicious. It does take a little longer to cook and takes some getting used to as it is not a direct flame heat like a gas grill. I set a timer to tell me when to flip the food I am cooking and usually flip several times. Ideal for those who cannot have a gas grill on a balcony
customer_reviews.author: Dean Fulton

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work. Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. I would give it a zero stars if possible. Grill stopped working in less than 3 months. Had several parts replaced. After each one was replaced (3 times), it still stopped working after 45 minutes. Wasted so much money on food that we couldn’t grill and wasted time asking for help to solve this issue (that is still not solved) . We called the company and the person they referred us to had a non working number for nearly 3 weeks and never responded to my emails. It is now, Feb. will never buy a Traeger again.
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: Stay away, find another grill that works
customer_reviews.text: This grill is a POS. I have had it since Dec. 2018 and I have had to call customer service 3 times already. First the temperature control was an issue so I had to replace the probe, then I was told I had to clean it each time i used it. Ok now i have an open flame in my grill with a brisket half cooked and customer service tells me its the controller. I’m not a repairmen, i shouldn’t have to do all this crap to a grill that is 9 months old. Never again stay away
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this grill
customer_reviews.text: I love this grill. There is no other way to put it. It’s extremely easy to use and clean, and makes everything taste great. Only down side is that the temp tops out at 450ish, but really if I need to sear something at that heat I’ll do it on the stove anyway. It’ll be the last grill you will ever need.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin and Allanna.

customer_reviews.title: No easy pellet change
customer_reviews.text: Would have liked an easy way to change the pellets as in the pro model. If this was prominently posted, I would have chosen the pro.
customer_reviews.author: raul gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Don't get the Discontinued model
customer_reviews.text: I bought my Lil' Tex Elite 22 in Aug 2019. Unfortunately I have had to call Traeger Customer Service twice because of Pellet and Auger issues. Finally the CS rep informed me this model of Traeger has been discontinued and removed from the Product Manual. I explained that I had only purchased this in August based upon such stellar reviews. He chuckled and said don't believe everything you read on the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Bert Ashland

customer_reviews.title: Great Smoker!
customer_reviews.text: There was some assembly required and it went together nicely. It works like a dream, it is the perfect size unless you have a very large group to cook for. Perfect for the two of us and four or five guests.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: By far the best grill/smoker I've ever owned. It requires a lot of cleaning after every cycle but it's a superbly well designed combination.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Sweet!! Finally have a killer smoker
customer_reviews.text: Sweet!! Finally have a killer smoker. Works great and is very easy to use. Everything has been great that I cooked. This one looks to be last years model, not the current one. I was a bit bummed but it's still a great smoker.
customer_reviews.author: 5wtjim

customer_reviews.title: When it works, it's awesome
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this grill on May 14th, 2018 and have already had to have 3 replacement cords sent to me. The grill just stops working. I've worked with Traeger directly but seem to only get a replacement cord sent. It will work afterwards, but only once or twice and then there is no power. I've troubleshot with Technical support and each time, it's the cord. I am hopeful the company will replace it as it's been down more than it's been usable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes grilling easy and delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he loves it! He’s a serious griller having used mostly charcoal which requires a lot of flipping. This grill is more like set it and forget it. Meat is incredibly moist!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Albert

customer_reviews.title: Traeger smoker
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good smoker. I really enjoy smoking with it. It has great smoke flavor also has consistent heat temperature you pretty much set it and forget it . The only knock on it had nothing to do with Traeger. When shipped it had dent,s all over from poor shipping handling
customer_reviews.author: Paul Breck

customer_reviews.title: Traeger Grill Lil Tex Elite 22 Wood Pellet Grill & Smoker
customer_reviews.text: This is a Fantastic Grill! WOW it does a Great job on everything I have cooked or smoked in it. It is expensive but you would never need to purchase another Grill or Smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Hammercl

customer_reviews.title: Traeger Is #1, now everyone is trying to copy them.
customer_reviews.text: I lost my Steel Keg, my Gas BBQ and my Digital Smoker in the Camp Fire. I have replaced them with my Traeger and it works great. Just a little experimenting and some reading and I am a professional..
customer_reviews.author: GVW

customer_reviews.title: a must for smoking meats
customer_reviews.text: Best smoker we ever owned. My husband loves to grill and smoked meats outside. He was thrilled when he opened the box at Christmas. Yummy!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy T.

customer_reviews.title: My 2nd one
customer_reviews.text: I like the original OR manufacture better- but understand economy of scale product. It is still a great product and it is my sixth purchase for my family and myself.
customer_reviews.author: TortugasMan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my husband for Christmas . It was easy to assemble and holds even heat. He loves it !( he competes in local BBQ competions and wishes he could use for them it's so good!)
customer_reviews.author: Tj

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Didn't realize a smoker could be so easy to use. It has replaced our propane grill! Glad we finally upgraded.
customer_reviews.author: S L Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Best smoker ever
customer_reviews.text: This makes even terrible cuts of meat into pure awesome, and raises great cuts to god like status.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: I love this wood fired oven
customer_reviews.text: I love this wood fired oven. :) Yes it smokes pork, beef, chicken, duck, excetera very well, but I baked a pizza at 425F and it was amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: First grill arrived with a dent on the control panel. Replacement grill arrived damaged also at the control panel.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Voss

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Gift.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for us birthday. He is in love with his new grill. This is a great product and very classy looking.
customer_reviews.author: dqgirl

customer_reviews.title: I love it! I love the rich smoke flavor I ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I love the rich smoke flavor I get and it is so easy to clean! I just wish it had 4 wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie

customer_reviews.title: Butthis!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best grill on the market and doubles as a smoker. Just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: fairgame13

customer_reviews.title: Traeger Forever.
customer_reviews.text: Best New home gift ever for my kids. They are rocking .it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't wake get one today
customer_reviews.text: Excellent very please as was family after using it 5 times in first two weekends
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all kinds of meat, fish and fowl.
customer_reviews.text: Our second Traeger! We wore the first one out. Great approach to outdoor cooking
customer_reviews.author: K. Graff

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, easy to cook with amazing flavors from the smoke the smokey flavor is a seasoning by itself everyone needs one of these
customer_reviews.author: Joe brown

customer_reviews.title: Meat lovers rejoice!
customer_reviews.text: Be the envy of the neighborhood and enjoy the ease of delicious smoked meals.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: This is the best grill, smoker I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is the best grill, smoker I have purchased. It is sooooo easy to use that even I can be a grillmaster!!!
customer_reviews.author: shay

customer_reviews.title: Treager stands by its product
customer_reviews.text: This product had problems right from the start. Treager stood by its product. Ended up paying a small amount upgrading to the 22” frill
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use it 3-4 times per week.
customer_reviews.text: I’m obsessed with this. That is all. Came a day late but it was holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TRAEGER IS HORRIBLE COMPANY
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely horrible !! Do not waste your money. They do not honor warranty and you will have problems. Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Scott R.

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery - Great product
customer_reviews.text: It arrived a week before expected. My husband is very happy and cooking almost every day :)
customer_reviews.author: JANAINA O.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite things in the world. If you don’t have one get one I will change the way you eat and make everything taste better
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Spath

customer_reviews.title: Damaged while shipping
customer_reviews.text: Grill is great. Cooked on it immediately after unboxing. Super unimpressed with shipping though after opening the box I notice that the hopper had been smashed in obviously by being miss handled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love this smoker. It makes the best meats I have EVER tasted.
customer_reviews.author: Hey old

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money. Easy to use smoker.
customer_reviews.text: Great grill. I have plenty of room to smoke a lot of food now. The meat I cook gets a good even smoke ring. It’s the easiest way you can smoke meat. This is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Quality grill
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a wedding gift for my son and daughter-in-law (they really wanted one). They absolutely LOVE it. We frequently get samples of their smoking/grilling ventures. The grill does a great job!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Holliman

customer_reviews.title: Very good smoker grill
customer_reviews.text: Very good smoker grill. The only thing is the temp. will vary a point they miss telling you on the Tv ad. You will need the insulation blanket to cook when the Temp get down to a chilly 32. F Had the auger jam up once. If you hear a fairly loud thump thump. Check the auger The gravity feed is pretty good but did leave the auger bare and I had to use a spoon handle to get the pellets to drop into the auger a vibrator motor would be wonderful to fix the problem listed above. All in all through the meat I have cooked turned out very good. Hope this helps you buying and building this grill.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Sutcliffe

customer_reviews.title: Ease of operation
customer_reviews.text: Great grill. Imparts wonderful smoked flavor and requires very little tending.
customer_reviews.author: David J Dempsey

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Best smoker bbq. We bought this for our Son as we have one already. We use this almost every day. Breakfast, lunch or dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Must have for home owners
customer_reviews.text: Love my Traeger!!! I use this thing for almost everything! No complaints and nice quality
customer_reviews.author: Cory Schellhaas

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works great can hold 3 racks of ribs , very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Teenabowers

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier. my cholesterol might take a hit but totally ...
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier. my cholesterol might take a hit but totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Loving my Treager!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love my treager! It’s easy to use and we are loving all the delicious foods we are cooking in it! Well worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: adrienne casey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's the only way to Barbeque. I will never use propane Barbeques again.Very well designed,and very well built.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Alderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great smoke flavor on St Louis Ribs, stuffed pork chops, whole chickens! Everything we've tried!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Karll

customer_reviews.title: Fright charge
customer_reviews.text: We like it cook steaks really well it was suppose to be ship free of charge but it wasn't
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: However i would buy a similar style just made better. it cooks
customer_reviews.text: The power box went out today and the paint coating peeled already. The whole grill needs replacing after just a few months. However i would buy a similar style just made better. it cooks amazing
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Johnston

customer_reviews.title: We were disappointed for the same price we thought we were getting ...
customer_reviews.text: We were disappointed for the same price we thought we were getting the one that we find out is only made for costco. That was a little disappointing when we found we did not have a warmer. We didn't do enough research
customer_reviews.author: Max stayrook

customer_reviews.title: Rotten Company; Rotten product.
customer_reviews.text: This expensive item arrived and has never worked. Customer service stinks.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Corriea

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Paying for the name not the functionality here. The bucket is for the grease, not ash. Cleaning this grill will be a pain and will be very messy. The add on folding shelf that was recommended does not fit. Not sure I've ever been so unhappy with a product. I grill 3-4 times a year and do so all year long. Will be donating this grill as I will not ever use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The grill is beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: The delivery of my grill it was left in tje middle of my lawn. Had I not been home it was 10 feet from my deck. I probably would have lost it. I caught him leaving made him help me get it on the deck. Not impressed with the delivery. The grill is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Oertwich

product_meta.title: Traeger TFB42LZBC Grills Lil Tex Elite 22 Wood Pellet Grill and Smoker - Grill, Smoke, Bake, Roast, Braise, and BBQ (Bronze)
product_meta.description: Craft amazing wood-fired creations with the Traeger Lil' Tex Elite 22 pellet Grill. From grilled steak, to smoked ribs, & even a freshly baked Apple Pie, The set It & forget it ease of use Allows any home chef to cook it all. Swap the gas & charcoal barbecue for 100% pure hardwood pellet flavor & Grill, smoke, BBQ, Bake, Roast, or Braise a masterpeice.
feature_bullets: Assembled Dimensions: 22" D x 42" W x 49" H | Cooking Grid Dimensions: 22" X 19" | Weight: 98 lbs
Never use gas or charcoal again: cooking with wood just tastes better. Traeger created the original wood-pellet Grill as the ultimate way to achieve wood-fired taste
Versatile barbecue cooking: hot and fast, or low and slow, the Traeger Lil' Tex Elite 22 pellet Grill offers 6-in-1 versatility to Grill, smoke, bake, roast, braise, and BBQ food to juicy perfection
Grilled to perfection every time: integrated digital Elite controller keeps temps within +/- 20 degrees F and makes setting the Grill temperature As easy as turning a dial
Easy and predictable: The Lil' Tex Elite 22 offers consistency you can trust, allowing you to craft amazing wood-fired creations time and time again with the ease of set it and forget it
Perfect size for the at-home cook: enjoy 418 sq. In. Of grilling space that can accommodate up to 16 burgers, 4 whole chickens, or 5 racks of ribs; pellet Hopper capacity: 18 lbs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars181 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
